death.attack.relicsofrain.electricity: %1$s learned why we avoid high voltage
death.attack.relicsofrain.electricity.it: %1$s got zapped by %2$s and their trusty %3$s
tooltip.relics.ukulele.ability.lightning: When hitting someone, there is a %1$s%% chance to create chain lightning that hits up to %2$s other targets within a %3$sm radius, dealing %4$s%% total damage to each
tooltip.relics.ukulele.leveling_source.l: This relic receives 1 experience point for every lightning chain created
tooltip.relics.frost_relic.description: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.
tooltip.relics.frost_relic.ability.ice_s: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals %1$s%% of base damage per second and slows enemies for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to %2$sm
tooltip.relics.frost_relic.leveling_sour: This relic receives 1 experience point for every trigger of the ability
tooltip.relics.energy_drink.leveling_sou: This relic receives 1 experience point for every second spent sprinting
tooltip.relics.platinum_horseshoe.abilit: All random effects are rolled +%1$s times for a favorable outcome
tooltip.relics.platinum_horseshoe.leveli: This relic receives 1 experience point for every successful roll made by the item
tooltip.relics.bustling_fungus.descripti: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1.5 seconds.
tooltip.relics.bustling_fungus.ability.h: After the holder remains stationary for 1.5 seconds, the item creates a radius of 2.5m which heals any ally within for %1$s%% health every second, as long as the holder remains still
tooltip.relics.bustling_fungus.leveling_: This relic receives 1 experience point for every healing tick
tooltip.relics.unlabeled_syringe.ability: The holder acquires +%1$s additional limbs in exchange for 1 other limb
tooltip.relics.soldier_syringe.descripti:
Increase attack speed.
Do not, and I repeat, do NOT use this on a zombie.
tooltip.relics.soldier_syringe.ability.a: The item increases attack speed by %1$s%%
tooltip.relics.soldier_syringe.leveling_: This relic receives 1 experience point for every hit
tooltip.relics.wax_quail.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.
tooltip.relics.wax_quail.ability.woah.de: The item grants an immediate %1$sx boost forward whenever the holder jumps while sprinting
tooltip.relics.wax_quail.leveling_source: This relic receives 1 experience point for every boosted jump
tooltip.relics.katana_trinket.ability.ag: Allows the player to sprint in any direction and not slow down after attacks
tooltip.relics.crowbar.description: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.
tooltip.relics.crowbar.ability.heavy_hit: When the holder attacks an enemy that has more than 90% of its health remaining, they deal %1$s%% more damage
tooltip.relics.crowbar.leveling_source.h: This relic receives 1 experience point for every increased hit
